member.name: T:ChocolateFactory.Models.Address
member.summary: Street address information for customers, employees, and vendors.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Address.AddressId
member.summary: Primary key for Address records.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Address.AddressLine1
member.summary: First street address line.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Address.AddressLine2
member.summary: Second street address line.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Address.City
member.summary: Name of the city.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Address.StateProvinceId
member.summary: Unique identification number for the state or province. Foreign key to StateProvince table.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Address.PostalCode
member.summary: Postal code for the street address.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Address.Rowguid
member.summary: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Address.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.

member.name: T:ChocolateFactory.Models.AddressType
member.summary: Types of addresses stored in the Address table.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.AddressType.AddressTypeId
member.summary: Primary key for AddressType records.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.AddressType.Name
member.summary: Address type description. For example, Billing, Home, or Shipping.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.AddressType.Rowguid
member.summary: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.AddressType.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.

member.name: T:ChocolateFactory.Models.AwbuildVersion

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.AwbuildVersion.SystemInformationId
member.summary: Primary key for AWBuildVersion records.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.AwbuildVersion.DatabaseVersion
member.summary: Version number of the database in 9.yy.mm.dd.00 format.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.AwbuildVersion.VersionDate
member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.AwbuildVersion.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.

member.name: T:ChocolateFactory.Models.BillOfMaterial
member.summary: Items required to make bicycles and bicycle subassemblies. It identifies the heirarchical relationship between a parent product and its components.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.BillOfMaterial.BillOfMaterialsId
member.summary: Primary key for BillOfMaterials records.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.BillOfMaterial.ProductAssemblyId
member.summary: Parent product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.BillOfMaterial.ComponentId
member.summary: Component identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.BillOfMaterial.StartDate
member.summary: Date the component started being used in the assembly item.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.BillOfMaterial.EndDate
member.summary: Date the component stopped being used in the assembly item.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.BillOfMaterial.UnitMeasureCode
member.summary: Standard code identifying the unit of measure for the quantity.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.BillOfMaterial.Bomlevel
member.summary: Indicates the depth the component is from its parent (AssemblyID).

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.BillOfMaterial.PerAssemblyQty
member.summary: Quantity of the component needed to create the assembly.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.BillOfMaterial.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.

member.name: T:ChocolateFactory.Models.DatabaseLog
member.summary: Audit table tracking all DDL changes made to the AdventureWorks database. Data is captured by the database trigger ddlDatabaseTriggerLog.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.DatabaseLog.DatabaseLogId
member.summary: Primary key for DatabaseLog records.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.DatabaseLog.PostTime
member.summary: The date and time the DDL change occurred.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.DatabaseLog.DatabaseUser
member.summary: The user who implemented the DDL change.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.DatabaseLog.Event
member.summary: The type of DDL statement that was executed.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.DatabaseLog.Schema
member.summary: The schema to which the changed object belongs.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.DatabaseLog.Object
member.summary: The object that was changed by the DDL statment.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.DatabaseLog.Tsql
member.summary: The exact Transact-SQL statement that was executed.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.DatabaseLog.XmlEvent
member.summary: The raw XML data generated by database trigger.

member.name: T:ChocolateFactory.Models.Employee

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Employee.NationalIdnumber
member.summary: Unique national identification number such as a social security number.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Employee.LoginId
member.summary: Network login.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Employee.JobTitle
member.summary: Work title such as Buyer or Sales Representative.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Employee.BirthDate
member.summary: Date of birth.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Employee.MaritalStatus
member.summary: M = Married, S = Single

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Employee.Gender
member.summary: M = Male, F = Female

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Employee.HireDate
member.summary: Employee hired on this date.

member.summary: Job classification. 0 = Hourly, not exempt from collective bargaining. 1 = Salaried, exempt from collective bargaining.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Employee.VacationHours
member.summary: Number of available vacation hours.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Employee.SickLeaveHours

member.summary: 0 = Inactive, 1 = Active

member.name: T:ChocolateFactory.Models.EmployeeDepartmentHistory
member.summary: Employee department transfers.

member.summary: Employee identification number. Foreign key to Employee.BusinessEntityID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.EmployeeDepartmentHistory.DepartmentId
member.summary: Department in which the employee worked including currently. Foreign key to Department.DepartmentID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.EmployeeDepartmentHistory.ShiftId
member.summary: Identifies which 8-hour shift the employee works. Foreign key to Shift.Shift.ID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.EmployeeDepartmentHistory.StartDate
member.summary: Date the employee started work in the department.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.EmployeeDepartmentHistory.EndDate
member.summary: Date the employee left the department. NULL = Current department.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.EmployeeDepartmentHistory.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.

member.name: T:ChocolateFactory.Models.EmployeePayHistory

member.summary: Employee identification number. Foreign key to Employee.BusinessEntityID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.EmployeePayHistory.RateChangeDate
member.summary: Date the change in pay is effective

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.EmployeePayHistory.Rate
member.summary: Salary hourly rate.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.EmployeePayHistory.PayFrequency
member.summary: 1 = Salary received monthly, 2 = Salary received biweekly

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.EmployeePayHistory.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.

member.name: T:ChocolateFactory.Models.ErrorLog
member.summary: Audit table tracking errors in the the AdventureWorks database that are caught by the CATCH block of a TRY...CATCH construct. Data is inserted by stored procedure dbo.uspLogError when it is executed from inside the CATCH block of a TRY...CATCH construct.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.ErrorLog.ErrorLogId
member.summary: Primary key for ErrorLog records.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.ErrorLog.ErrorTime
member.summary: The date and time at which the error occurred.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.ErrorLog.UserName
member.summary: The user who executed the batch in which the error occurred.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.ErrorLog.ErrorNumber
member.summary: The error number of the error that occurred.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.ErrorLog.ErrorSeverity
member.summary: The severity of the error that occurred.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.ErrorLog.ErrorState
member.summary: The state number of the error that occurred.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.ErrorLog.ErrorProcedure
member.summary: The name of the stored procedure or trigger where the error occurred.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.ErrorLog.ErrorLine
member.summary: The line number at which the error occurred.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.ErrorLog.ErrorMessage
member.summary: The message text of the error that occurred.

member.summary: Primary key for Person records.

member.summary: Primary type of person: SC = Store Contact, IN = Individual (retail) customer, SP = Sales person, EM = Employee (non-sales), VC = Vendor contact, GC = General contact

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Person.NameStyle
member.summary: 0 = The data in FirstName and LastName are stored in western style (first name, last name) order. 1 = Eastern style (last name, first name) order.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Person.Title
member.summary: A courtesy title. For example, Mr. or Ms.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Person.FirstName
member.summary: First name of the person.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Person.MiddleName
member.summary: Middle name or middle initial of the person.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Person.LastName
member.summary: Last name of the person.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Person.Suffix
member.summary: Surname suffix. For example, Sr. or Jr.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Person.EmailPromotion
member.summary: 0 = Contact does not wish to receive e-mail promotions, 1 = Contact does wish to receive e-mail promotions from AdventureWorks, 2 = Contact does wish to receive e-mail promotions from AdventureWorks and selected partners.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.Person.AdditionalContactInfo
member.summary: Additional contact information about the person stored in xml format.

member.name: T:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderDetail
member.summary: Individual products associated with a specific purchase order. See PurchaseOrderHeader.

member.summary: Primary key. Foreign key to PurchaseOrderHeader.PurchaseOrderID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderDetail.PurchaseOrderDetailId
member.summary: Primary key. One line number per purchased product.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderDetail.DueDate
member.summary: Date the product is expected to be received.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderDetail.OrderQty
member.summary: Quantity ordered.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderDetail.ProductId
member.summary: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderDetail.UnitPrice
member.summary: Vendor's selling price of a single product.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderDetail.LineTotal
member.summary: Per product subtotal. Computed as OrderQty * UnitPrice.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderDetail.ReceivedQty
member.summary: Quantity actually received from the vendor.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderDetail.RejectedQty
member.summary: Quantity rejected during inspection.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderDetail.StockedQty
member.summary: Quantity accepted into inventory. Computed as ReceivedQty - RejectedQty.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderDetail.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.

member.name: T:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader
member.summary: General purchase order information. See PurchaseOrderDetail.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.PurchaseOrderId
member.summary: Primary key.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.RevisionNumber
member.summary: Incremental number to track changes to the purchase order over time.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.Status
member.summary: Order current status. 1 = Pending; 2 = Approved; 3 = Rejected; 4 = Complete

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.EmployeeId
member.summary: Employee who created the purchase order. Foreign key to Employee.BusinessEntityID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.VendorId
member.summary: Vendor with whom the purchase order is placed. Foreign key to Vendor.BusinessEntityID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.ShipMethodId
member.summary: Shipping method. Foreign key to ShipMethod.ShipMethodID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.OrderDate
member.summary: Purchase order creation date.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.ShipDate
member.summary: Estimated shipment date from the vendor.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.SubTotal
member.summary: Purchase order subtotal. Computed as SUM(PurchaseOrderDetail.LineTotal)for the appropriate PurchaseOrderID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.TaxAmt
member.summary: Tax amount.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.Freight
member.summary: Shipping cost.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.TotalDue
member.summary: Total due to vendor. Computed as Subtotal + TaxAmt + Freight.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.PurchaseOrderHeader.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.

member.summary: Primary key. Foreign key to SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.SalesOrderDetail.SalesOrderDetailId
member.summary: Primary key. One incremental unique number per product sold.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.SalesOrderDetail.CarrierTrackingNumber
member.summary: Shipment tracking number supplied by the shipper.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.SalesOrderDetail.OrderQty
member.summary: Quantity ordered per product.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.SalesOrderDetail.ProductId
member.summary: Product sold to customer. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.SalesOrderDetail.SpecialOfferId
member.summary: Promotional code. Foreign key to SpecialOffer.SpecialOfferID.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.SalesOrderDetail.UnitPrice
member.summary: Selling price of a single product.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.SalesOrderDetail.UnitPriceDiscount
member.summary: Discount amount.

member.name: P:ChocolateFactory.Models.SalesOrderDetail.LineTotal
member.summary: Per product subtotal. Computed as UnitPrice * (1 - UnitPriceDiscount) * OrderQty.

member.summary: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample.

member.summary: Date and time the record was last updated.
